text: ''Ulfric calls, and I hunt—for his enemies are meat undeserving breath''.
An ancient, guttural cry that sends fear through enemy ranks and fire into his allies.
His claw-swipes tear through shield and sinew with brutal efficiency.
The redder his pelt, the faster he strikes—wounded or not.
Where others bleed, he heals—cursed flesh reshaping around bone and will.
Those under the yoke of Chaos tremble—Haftagg knows how to unchain them violently.
He remembers every traitor—and his claws never forget.
“The more they bleed, the faster he comes.”
The Bjornlings' bloodhound — stalking on all fours, he never loses the scent

Haftagg has long ceased to resemble the man he once was. Twisted by the curse of the werekin many years past, his transformation is complete — not into a howling monster, but into something far worse: a calculating predator. His body has grown lean, his limbs adapted for movement on all fours, and his senses sharpened to uncanny acuity. While other skinwolves roar in blind rage, Haftagg watches. Waits. Stalks. Kept by the Bjornlings like one might keep a prized warhound, Haftagg is loosed when enemies must vanish, when prey must be found no matter the terrain, or when whispers in the dark are answered with tearing flesh. None escape his nose. None survive once marked.
“A blur in the brush, a growl in your spine… then pain.”
When prey is near, Haftagg’s limbs twitch with bloodlust - his eyes filled with crimson red rage.
Global Recruitment duration: %+n turn for all Skin wolves units
